title: 257. The Future (Probably) Isn’t as Scary as You Think
description: Internet pioneer Kevin Kelly tries to predict the future by identifying what's truly inevitable. How worried should we be? Yes, robots will probably take your job -- but the future will still be pretty great.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
